law.catch_line: Trooper R Class or commercial vehicle enforcement officer R Class to adhere to agency standards of conduct and policy -- Complaints.

text.section: All individuals employed as a Trooper R Class or commercial vehicle enforcement officer R class shall adhere to the agency standards of conduct and policy.

Any person may proffer charges against an individual employed as a Trooper R Class or commercial vehicle enforcement officer R class by submitting a written complaint, signed by the complainant, with the Office of Internal Affairs within the department.

law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 64, sec. 4, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 59, sec. 15, effective June 25, 2009.
